selected_skills.name: extract_text_from_image
selected_skills.purpose: Extract roughness values from the attached image.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to extract text from the image to obtain roughness values for Coral, Granite, Marble, and Sandstone.

selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: Perform numerical comparison of roughness values.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to compare the extracted roughness values numerically to determine if Coral has the highest roughness.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: Format the final answer in the required multiple-choice format.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to format the final answer as 'Answer: A' or 'Answer: B' based on the comparison result.

new_skill_specs.name: compare_roughness_values
new_skill_specs.purpose: Determine if Coral has the highest roughness value among the given materials.
inputs: A list of roughness values for Coral, Granite, Marble, and Sandstone.
new_skill_specs.outputs: A boolean indicating if Coral is the roughest.
edge_cases: All materials have the same roughness value.
Coral has the lowest roughness value.
